recommendations: Amit Verma ‚ÄúPrashant is one of those guys who gets the job done with highest quality of work. His technical knowledge is superb. Be it C# or any other technical stack he can help you out. He is also very proactive not only in work but also other extra curricular activity. Either it be making plan for trip, sports or dinner. Best part about him which i liked most - Leadership quality which differentiate him with most of his peers hence earns my highest recommendation‚Äù

Jigar Mehta ‚ÄúI thoroughly enjoy the time working with Prashant, and came to know him as a truly valuable asset to absolutely any team. He is honest, dependable, and incredibly hard-working. Beyond that, he is an impressive speaker who is always to the point. His knowledge and expertise in the concepts of programming were a huge advantage to our entire team. Without a doubt, I confidently recommend Prashant for anything challenging and be sure that he will come up with a solution no matter how deep he has to go. I wish him the very best for anything that he sets his sight to. Go, get 'em! Cheers!‚Äù
